about_the_game:
If you like this game, please add it to your wish list~
All materials are genuine license

About this game:


There is a girl next door to you who makes your heart move. One night~ you heard her sad cry. It turned out that her fiancé died for some reason because she was hit hard. You decide to take the place of her fiancé and do your duty to save her, both physically and mentally...


This is a choice-driven visual novel (vn).
In this game, you play as a young man full of energy and desire, meet the girl next door, enter her life, and get to know all aspects of her...  


The game contains:

Realistic and beautiful 3D character images.

20+ events, more than 100+ segments of 3D video CG.

content_descriptors.notes:
- This game contains some sexual innuendos, depictions of kissing and flirting, and sexy and revealing clothing.
- All characters in the game are over 18 years old.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

name: Other people's fiancee became my woman

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card

short_description: You are a gentleman, one night ~ you heard the sad cry of the girl next door, to comfort her, you knocked on the door and entered her room...
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
